TODO: Phase 7 - Advanced Tools Extension

Purpose: Provide advanced dataset operations for power users including transformations, aggregations, complex queries, deduplication, merging, and performance optimization.

Implementation Plan:
1. Implement AdvancedToolsExtension class
2. Create DataTransformationEngine with expression evaluation
3. Implement AggregationEngine for grouping and calculations
4. Create QueryBuilder and executor for complex queries
5. Implement DataDeduplicationEngine with multiple strategies
6. Create DataMergingEngine with join operations
7. Implement PerformanceTuner with analysis and recommendations
8. Create DataProfilingEngine for comprehensive analysis
9. Implement advanced export formats (Parquet, HDF5, etc.)
10. Add expression compilation and caching
11. Implement parallel processing for large datasets
12. Add performance monitoring and logging

Dependencies:
- BaseExtension (src/Extensions/SDK/BaseExtension.cs)
- IDatasetService
- IStorageService
- INotificationService
- ILoggingService
- ICachingService
- Expression evaluation library (System.Linq.Dynamic or similar)
- Columnar data format libraries (Parquet, HDF5)
- Performance monitoring utilities

References:
- See REFACTOR_PLAN.md Phase 7 for Advanced Tools implementation details
- See src/Extensions/SDK/DevelopmentGuide.md for extension development instructions
- See src/Core/BusinessLogic for existing transformation logic
- See src/APIBackend/Services for service integration patterns
